chapter.text: 56|1|Yetiya kiyamata sanghatita ha’ba
56|2|(tetiya) iyara sanghatanara asbikarakarai kono nathakiba.
56|3|I karaobaka adhahpatana karaiba, karaobaka samunnata karaiba
56|4|yetiya prthirai prabala prakampanerae prakampita ha’ba
56|5|arau parbatasamuha curna-bicurna hai paraiba
56|6|phalata se'ibora biksipta dhulikanata parainata ha’ba
56|7|arau tomaloke bibhakta hai paraiba tinita dalata
56|8|eteke somphalara dala; arau somphalara dalato kimana ye saubhagyabana
56|9|arau ba'omphalara dala; arau ba'omphalara dalato kimana ye durbhagiya
56|10|arau agragamisakale'i agragami
56|11|te'omloke'i sannidhyapraapta
56|12|te'omloka thakiba niyamatapurna jannatasamuhata
56|13|bahusankhyaka ha’ba purbarartisakalara majara paraa
56|14|arau kama sankhyaka ha’ba parabartisakalara majara paraa.
56|15|Sonerae nirmita asanamuhata
56|16|sihamte parasparae mukhamukhikai a'uji bahiba.
56|17|Sihamtara ase-pase ghuraiphuraiba cira kisorasakale
56|18|prabahita nijaraara suraapurna panapatra arau piyalabora lai
56|19|se'i suraa pana karaile te'omlokara mura nughuraaya arau te'omloka jnanaharaa'o naha’ba
56|20|arau (ghuraiphuraiba) te'omlokara pachandaniya phala-mula lai
56|21|arau te'omlokara rauci anuyayi caraa'ira mansa lai.
56|22|Arau te'omlokara babe thakiba mrganayani (danara cakubisista) hura
56|23|yeniba sihamta suraksita mukutahe
56|24|sihamte yi amala karaichila tara puraskarasbaraupa.
56|25|Tata sihamte kono alagatiyala katha arau kono papabakya sunibalai napaba
56|26|suniba kerala chalama arau chalama.
56|27|Arau somphalara dala; kimana ye bhagyabana somphalara dalato
56|28|Te'omloke thakiba ene udyanata, ya’ta ache kamitabihina bagarai gacha
56|29|arau thokerae bharaa kala gacha
56|30|arau samprasaraita cham
56|31|arau sadaya prabahamana pani
56|32|arau pracura phala-mula
56|33|yibora sesa naha'ba arau nisid'dha'o naha’ba.
56|34|Arau (sihamta thakiba) su'ucca sayyasamuhata
56|35|niscaya ami sihamtaka (hurasakalaka) srsti karaicho bisesaraupata
56|36|tara pichata sihamtaka kumarai bana'icho
56|37|nija sbamira prati asakta arau samabayasiya
56|38|somphalara lokasakalara babe.
56|39|Sihamtara bechibhage'i ha'ba purbarartilokasalara majara paraa
56|40|arau bahusankhyaka ha'ba parabartisakalara majara paraa.
56|41|Arau ba'omphalara dala, kimana ye durbhagiya ba'omphalara dalato
56|42|sihamta thakiba atyanta usna bayu arau uttapta utala panita
56|43|arau ati ka'la dhomraara chamta
56|44|yito sitalo nahaya arau araamadayako nahaya.
56|45|Niscaya sihamta itipurbe bhoga-bilasata magna achila
56|46|arau sihamta abiraama lipta achila jaghan'ya papa kamata.
56|47|Arau sihamte kaichila, ‘ami yetiya marai mati arau harata parainata hama tetiya'o amaka punaraut'thita karaa ha’bane’
56|48|arau amara pitrpurausasakalako (uthoraa ha’bane)
56|49|koraa, ‘niscaya purbarartisakalako arau parabartisakalako
56|50|sakaloke ekatraita karaa ha’ba eta nirdharaita dinara nirdista samayata’.
56|51|Tara pichata, he bibhraanta asbikarakaraisakala
56|52|niscaya ahara karaiba yakkuma gachara paraa
56|53|se'itorae'i tomaloke peta bharaaba
56|54|taduparai tara oparata pana karaiba uttapta utala pani
56|55|tara pichata tomaloke trsnatura utara darae se'i pani pana karaiba.
56|56|Pratiphala dirasata e'itorae ha’ba sihamtara apyayana.
56|57|Amiye'i tomalokaka srsti karaicho; teneha’le kiya tomaloke bisbasa nakaraa
56|58|tomaloke bhabichane tomalokara biryapata samparke
56|59|se'ito tomaloke srsti karaa, ne ami srsti karao
56|60|amiye'i tomalokara majata mrtyu nirdharana karaicho arau ami aksama naha'om
56|61|tomalokara sthanata tomalokara sadrsa anibalai arau tomalokaka ene eta akrtita srsti karaibalai yito tomaloke najana.
56|62|Arau niscaya tomaloke aragata haicha prathama srsti samparke, tente kiya tomaloke upadesa grahana nakaraa
56|63|tomaloke yi bija simca se'i bisaye tomaloke bhabi ca'ichane
56|64|se'ito tomaloke ankuraita karaa, ne ami ankuraita karao
56|65|ami iccha karaile iyaka khera-kutata parainata karaiba parao, tetiya tomaloke hatasa hai paraiba
56|66|(e'i buli) ‘niscaya ami dayagrasta hai parailo’
56|67|‘baram ami bancita haicho’.
56|68|Tomaloke yi pani pana karaa se'i samparke koraacona
56|69|meghara paraa se'ito tomaloke nama'i ana, ne ami se'ito barsana karao
56|70|ami iccha karaile se'ito luniya karai diba parao. Tathapi'o kiya tomaloke krtajnata prakasa nakaraa
56|71|tomaloke yi ju'i jbaloraa se'i bisaye koraacona
56|72|tomaloke iyara gacha srsti karaa, ne ami srsti karao
56|73|iyaka ami karaicho eta smaraka arau maraubhumitabasa karaa lokara prayojaniya bastu.
56|74|Eteke tumi tomara mahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa.
56|75|Eteke ma'i sapata karaicho naksatraraajira astacalara
56|76|arau niscaya e'ito eta mahasapata, yadi tomaloke janilahemtena
56|77|niscaya e'ito mahimanbita kora'ana
56|78|yito ache suraksita kitabata (lipibad'dha).
56|79|Paraitrasakalara bahirae ana konorae iyaka sparsa karaiba noraarae.
56|80|E'ito srstijagatara pratipalakara paraa aratirna.
56|81|Tathapi'o tomaloke e'i banika tuccha buli bhabicha neki
56|82|arau tomaloke asbikara karaake'i tomalokara jiraika karai laicha
56|83|eteke kiya nahaya—praana yetiya kanthagata haya
56|84|arau tetiya tomaloke (asahaya hai) ca'i thaka
56|85|arau ami tomalokatakai'o tara bechi ocarata thako, kintu tomaloke dekha noporaa.
56|86|Eteke yadi tomaloke hicapa-nikaca arau pratiphalara sanmukhina nohoraa
56|87|teneha'le tomaloke se'ito (atmato) ghuraa'i nana kiya? Yadi tomaloke satyabadi
56|88|tara pichata si yadi naikatyapraaptasakalara ejana haya
56|89|tente tara babe thakiba bisraama, uttama jiranopakarana arau sukhamaya jannata.
56|90|Arau si yadi haya somphalara dalara ejana
56|91|tente (taka koraa ha’ba) ‘tomara prati chalama’, yihetu tumi somphalara ejana.
56|92|Kintu si yadi haya asbikarakarai, bibhraantasakalara ejana
56|93|tente tara atithya karaa ha’ba utala panira dbaraa
56|94|arau jahannamara dahanerae
56|95|niscaya e'ito suniscita satya.
56|96|Eteke tumi tomara mahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa.
